00045                 public function BaseController()
00046                 {

00059                 protected function initialize()
00060                 {
00061                         $classname = get_class($this);
00062                         $this->name = strtolower(substr($classname, 0, strpos($classname, "Controller")));
00063                         if (isset($_REQUEST['action']) && !empty($_REQUEST['action']))
00064                         {
00065                                 if (is_callable(array($this, $_REQUEST['action'])))
00066                                 {
00067                                         $this->action = $_REQUEST['action'];
00068                                 }
00069                                 else
00070                                 {
00071                                         $this->unknown_action();
00072                                 }
00073                         }
00074                         else
00075                         {
00076                                 $this->action = 'index';
00077                         }
00078                                 
00079                         $this->title = "EmeRails";
00080                 }

00090                         // Default implementation does nothing.

00126                 protected function before_filter($filter, $params = NULL)
00127                 {
00128                         if (is_array($filter))
00129                         {
00130                                 foreach ($filter as $f)
00131                                 {
00132                                         $this->before_filter($f, $params);
00133                                 }
00134                                 return;
00135                         }
00136                         $this->before_filters[] = array($filter, $params);
00137                 }
00138 
00167                 protected function after_filter($filter, $params = NULL)
00168                 {
00169                         if (is_array($filter))
00170                         {
00171                                 foreach ($filter as $f)
00172                                 {
00173                                         $this->after_filter($f, $params);
00174                                 }
00175                                 return;
00176                         }
00177                         $this->after_filters[] = array($filter, $params);
00178                 }
00179 
00189                 private function filter_applicable($conditions)
00190                 {                       
00191                         if (is_array($conditions))
00192                         {
00193                                 // If an 'except' key exists, check that the action is not included
00194                                 if (array_key_exists('except', $conditions))
00195                                 {
00196                                         $except = $conditions['except'];
00197                                         if (is_array($except))
00198                                         {
00199                                                 return !in_array($this->action, $except);
00200                                         }
00201                                         else if ($except != $this->action)
00202                                         {
00203                                                 return TRUE;
00204                                         }
00205                                 }
00206                                 // If an 'only' key exists, check that the action is included
00207                                 else if (array_key_exists('only', $conditions))
00208                                 {
00209                                         $only = $conditions['only'];
00210                                         if (is_array($only))
00211                                         {
00212                                                 return in_array($this->action, $only);
00213                                         }
00214                                         else if ($only == $this->action)
00215                                         {
00216                                                 return TRUE;
00217                                         }
00218                                 }
00219                                 return FALSE;
00220                         }
00221                         return TRUE;
00222                 }
00223                 
00235                 protected function caches_page($page)
00236                 {
00237                         if (is_array($page))
00238                         {
00239                                 foreach ($page as $p)
00240                                 {
00241                                         $this->caches_page($p);
00242                                 }
00243                                 return;
00244                         }
00245                         $this->pages_cached[] = $page;
00246                 }

00259                         {
00260                                 $this->caches_page($page);
00261                         }
00262                 }

00280                 protected function cached_page_exists()
00281                 {
00282                         return file_exists($this->cached_page_filename());
00283                 }

00291                 protected function cached_page_filename()
00292                 {
00293                         $lang = isset($_COOKIE['hl']) ? $_COOKIE['hl'] : 'en';
00294                         $id = isset($_REQUEST['id']) ? "@{$_REQUEST['id']}" : '';
00295                         $cachefile = dirname(__FILE__) . "/../caches/{$this->name}/{$this->action}{$id}-{$lang}.cached";
00296                         return $cachefile;
00297                 }

00304                 protected function expire_cached_page($params)
00305                 {
00306                         $controller = isset($params['controller']) ? $params['controller'] : $this->name;
00307                         $action = isset($params['action']) ? $params['action'] : $this->action;
00308                         $id = isset($params['id']) ? "@{$params['id']}" : '';
00309                         
00310                         $langs = Localization::$languages;
00311                         
00312                         foreach ($langs as $lang)
00313                         {
00314                                 $cachefile = dirname(__FILE__) . "/../caches/{$controller}/{$action}{$id}-{$lang}.cached";
00315                                 @unlink($cachefile);
00316                         }
00317                 }

00331                 protected function redirect_to($params)
00332                 {
00333                         if (is_array($params))
00334                         {
00335                                 $URL = sprintf("http://%s%s%s",
00336                                         $_SERVER["HTTP_HOST"],
00337                                         $this->url_to($params),
00338                                         isset($params['query_string']) && !empty($params['query_string']) ? "?{$params['query_string']}" : '');
00339                                 if (!isset($params['after']))
00340                                 {
00341                                         $this->response->add_header("Location", $URL);
00342                                         $this->response->flush();
00343                                 }
00344                                 else
00345                                 {
00346                                         $this->add_meta_header(array('http_equiv' => 'refresh',
00347                                                 'content' => "{$params['after']};url={$URL}"));
00348                                 }
00349                         }
00350                         else
00351                         {
00352                                 $this->response->add_header("Location", $params);
00353                                 $this->response->flush();
00354                         }
00355                 }

00366                 protected function redirect_to_referrer($or_else = NULL)
00367                 {
00368                         if (isset($_SERVER['HTTP_REFERER']))
00369                         {
00370                                 $this->redirect_to($_SERVER['HTTP_REFERER']);
00371                         }
00372                         else if (!empty($or_else))
00373                         {
00374                                 $this->redirect_to($or_else);
00375                         }
00376                 }

00378                 public function add_meta_header($params)
00379                 {
00380                         if (!$this->headers)
00381                         {
00382                                 $this->headers = array();
00383                         }
00384                         if (isset($params['http_equiv']))
00385                         {
00386                                 $this->headers[] = "<meta http-equiv=\"{$params['http_equiv']}\" content=\"{$params['content']}\" />";
00387                         }
00388                         else
00389                         {
00390                                 $this->headers[] = "<meta name=\"{$params['name']}\" content=\"{$params['content']}\" />";
00391                         }
00392                 }

00408                 public function link_to($text, $params = array())
00409                 {
00410                         $params['href'] = isset($params['href']) ?
00411                                 $params['href'] : $this->make_relative_url($params);
00412                         
00413                         unset($params['action']);
00414                         unset($params['controller']);
00415                         unset($params['id']);
00416                         
00417                         print a($text, $params);
00418                 }

00431                 public function link_to_remote($text, $params = array())
00432                 {
00433                         $params['href'] = !empty($params['href']) ? $params['href'] : $this->make_relative_url($params);
00434                         $params['remote_url'] = !empty($params['remote_url']) ? $params['remote_url'] : $this->make_relative_url($params);
00435                         // Ajax magic
00436                         $params['onclick'] = "$('#{$params['target']}').html('<div class=&quot;loading&quot;><span>" . l('Loading...') . "</span></div>').load('{$params['remote_url']}'); return false";
00437                         
00438                         unset($params['action']);
00439                         unset($params['controller']);
00440                         unset($params['id']);
00441                         unset($params['target']);
00442                         unset($params['remote_url']);
00443                         
00444                         print a($text, $params);
00445                 }

00470                 function url_to_myself($relative = TRUE)
00471                 {
00472                         $url = $this->url_to(array('action' => $this->action, 'id' => @$_REQUEST['id']));
00473                         return $relative ?
00474                                 $url :
00475                                 sprintf('http://%s%s%s',
00476                                         $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'],
00477                                         APPLICATION_ROOT,
00478                                         $url);

00496                 public function make_relative_url($params)
00497                 {
00498                         $controller = (!isset($params['controller']) || empty($params['controller'])) ?
00499                                 $this->name : $params['controller'];
00500                         $type = (isset($params['type']) && !empty($params['type'])) ?
00501                                 $params['type'] : 'html';
00502                         if (isset($params['action']) && !empty($params['action']))
00503                         {
00504                                 if (isset($params['id']) && !empty($params['id']))
00505                                 {
00506                                         $href = sprintf('%s%s/%s/%s',
00507                                                 APPLICATION_ROOT,
00508                                                 $controller,
00509                                                 $params['action'],
00510                                                 $params['id']);
00511                                 }
00512                                 else
00513                                 {
00514                                         $href = sprintf('%s%s/%s.%s',
00515                                                 APPLICATION_ROOT,
00516                                                 $controller,
00517                                                 $params['action'],
00518                                                 $type);                                 
00519                                 }
00520                         }
00521                         else
00522                         {
00523                                 $href = sprintf('%s%s/index.%s',
00524                                         APPLICATION_ROOT,
00525                                         $controller,
00526                                         $type);                         
00527                         }
00528                         if (isset($params['query_string']))
00529                         {
00530                                 $href .= "?{$params['query_string']}";
00531                         }
00532                         if (isset($params['hash']))
00533                         {
00534                                 $href .= "#{$params['hash']}";
00535                         }
00536                         return $href;
00537                 }
00538                 
00561                 public function render($params)
00562                 {
00563                         if ($this->rendered)
00564                         {
00565                                 return;
00566                         }
00567                         // Initialize rendered content
00568                         $rendered = NULL;
00569                         if ($params === NULL)
00570                         {
00571                                 $this->rendered = TRUE;
00572                         }
00573                         else if (isset($params['partial']))
00574                         {
00575                                 // Get part file
00576                                 $partfile = dirname(__FILE__) . "/../views/{$this->name}/_{$params['partial']}.php";
00577                                 
00578                                 // Connect main object
00579                                 if (isset($params['object']))
00580                                 {
00581                                         eval("\${$params['partial']} = \$params['object'];");
00582                                 }
00583                                 else
00584                                 {
00585                                         eval("if (isset(\$this->{$params['partial']})) \${$params['partial']} = \$this->{$params['partial']};");
00586                                 }
00587                                 
00588                                 // Start output buffering
00589                                 ob_start();
00590                                 
00591                                 // Evaluate and send to buffer
00592                                 print eval($this->load_part_contents($partfile));
00593                         
00594                                 // Get buffer contents, clean output buffer
00595                                 $rendered = ob_get_clean();
00596                         }
00597                         else
00598                         {
00599                                 // Get action to render
00600                                 $action = (isset($params['action']) && !empty($params['action'])) ? 
00601                                         $params['action'] : $this->action;
00602                                         
00603                                 // Get part file
00604                                 $partfile = dirname(__FILE__) . "/../views/{$this->name}/{$action}.php";
00605                                 
00606                                 // Start output buffering
00607                                 ob_start();
00608                                 
00609                                 // Evaluate and send to buffer
00610                                 print eval($this->load_part_contents($partfile));
00611                                 
00612                                 // Get buffer contents
00613                                 $this->content_for_layout = ob_get_contents();
00614                                 // Backwards compatibility
00615                                 $this->page_content = $this->content_for_layout;
00616                                 
00617                                 // Clean output buffer
00618                                 ob_end_clean();
00619                                 
00620                                 if (isset($params['layout']) && $params['layout'] == FALSE ||
00621                                         isset($_REQUEST['nolayout']))
00622                                 {
00623                                         // Do not print layout
00624                                         $rendered = $this->content_for_layout;
00625                                 }
00626                                 else
00627                                 {
00628                                         $rendered = $this->render_layout($params);
00629                                 }
00630                                 
00631                                 $this->rendered = TRUE;
00632                         }
00633                         
00634                         if (isset($params['return']))
00635                         {
00636                                 return $rendered;
00637                         }
00638                         else
00639                         {
00640                                 print $rendered;
00641                         }
00642                 }
00643 
00652                 public function render_as_string($params)
00653                 {
00654                         $params['return'] = TRUE;
00655                         return $this->render($params);
00656                 }

00667                 protected function render_layout($params)
00668                 {
00669                         $layout = isset($params['layout']) && !empty($params['layout']) ?
00670                                 $params['layout'] : $this->name;
00671                                 
00672                         // Initialize rendered content
00673                         $rendered = NULL;
00674                         
00675                         // Start output buffering
00676                         ob_start();
00677                         
00678                         // Get part file
00679                         $partfile = dirname(__FILE__) . "/../views/layouts/{$layout}_layout.php";
00680                         if (!file_exists($partfile))
00681                         {
00682                                 // Fall back to default layout
00683                                 $partfile = dirname(__FILE__) . "/../views/layouts/default_layout.php";
00684                         }
00685                         
00686                         // Evaluate and send to buffer
00687                         print eval($this->load_part_contents($partfile));
00688                 
00689                         // Get buffer contents, clean output buffer
00690                         $rendered = ob_get_clean();
00691                         
00692                         return $rendered;
00693                 }
00694 
00706                 public function render_page()
00707                 {
00708                         // Process before filters queue
00709                         foreach ($this->before_filters as $before_filter)
00710                         {
00711                                 if ($this->filter_applicable($before_filter[1]))
00712                                 {
00713                                         $filter = $before_filter[0];
00714                                         $this->$filter();
00715                                 }
00716                         }
00717 
00718                         // If the page should be cached, verify if it exists in the cache
00719                         if (in_array($this->action, $this->pages_cached) &&
00720                                         $this->cached_page_exists())
00721                         {
00722                                 $cached_file = $this->cached_page_filename();
00723                                 if (isset($this->mimetype))
00724                                 {
00725                                         $this->response->add_header('Content-Type', $this->mimetype);
00726                                 }
00727                                 $this->response->add_header('Content-Length', filesize($cached_file));
00728                                 $this->response->body .= file_get_contents($cached_file);
00729                         }
00730                         else
00731                         {                       
00732                                 // Start buffering
00733                                 ob_start();
00734                         
00735                                 // Call eventual controller action
00736                                 if (is_callable(array($this, $this->action)))
00737                                 {
00738                                         $this->{$this->action}();
00739                                 }
00740                                 else
00741                                 {
00742                                         HTTP::error(500);
00743                                 }
00744                                 // Call render on the controller
00745                                 // This won't have effect if the controller has already rendered
00746                                 $this->render($_REQUEST);
00747 
00748                                 // Get response body, clean output buffer
00749                                 $this->response->body .= ob_get_clean();
00750                                 
00751                                 // Conversely, if the page should be cached, store it in cache
00752                                 if (in_array($this->action, $this->pages_cached))
00753                                 {
00754                                         $caches_dir = dirname($this->cached_page_filename());
00755                                         if (!file_exists($caches_dir))
00756                                         {
00757                                                 mkdir($caches_dir, 0700);
00758                                         }
00759                                         file_put_contents($this->cached_page_filename(), $this->response->body);
00760                                 }
00761                         }
00762                         
00763                         // Process after filters queue
00764                         foreach ($this->after_filters as $after_filter)
00765                         {
00766                                 if ($this->filter_applicable($after_filter[1]))
00767                                 {
00768                                         $filter = $after_filter[0];
00769                                         $this->$filter();
00770                                 }
00771                         }
00772                         
00773                         if (isset($this->mimetype))
00774                         {
00775                                 $this->response->add_header('Content-Type', $this->mimetype);
00776                         }
00777                         
00778                         // Finally, flush responses
00779                         $this->response->flush();
00780                 }
00781 
00793                 public function render_component($params)
00794                 {
00795                         $_GET = array_merge($_GET, $params);
00796                         if (!isset($params['controller']))
00797                         {
00798                                 $classname = $this->name;
00799                         }
00800                         else
00801                         {
00802                                 $classname = table_name_to_class_name($params['controller']);
00803                                 require_once(dirname(__FILE__) . "/../controllers/{$params['controller']}_controller.php");
00804                         }
00805                         $controller = eval("return new {$classname}Controller();");
00806                         unset($params['controller']);
00807                         if (isset($params['action']))
00808                         {
00809                                 $controller->action = $params['action'];
00810                         }
00811                         eval("\$controller->{$params['action']}();");
00812                         $params['layout'] = FALSE;
00813                         $controller->render($params);
00814                 }

00822                 protected function load_part_contents($filename)
00823                 {
00824                         if (!file_exists($filename))
00825                         {
00826                                 HTTP::error(500);
00827                         }
00828                         $contents = file_get_contents($filename);
00829                         return $this->strip_external_php_tags($contents);
00830                 }
00831 
00838                 protected function strip_external_php_tags($php_code)
00839                 {
00840                         if (($start = strpos($php_code, "<?php")) === 0)
00841                         {
00842                                 $php_code = substr($php_code, $start + strlen("<?php"));
00843                         }
00844                         else
00845                         {
00846                                 $php_code = "?>\n" . $php_code;
00847                         }
00848                         if (($end = strrpos($php_code, "?>")) === strlen($php_code) - strlen("?>"))
00849                         {
00850                                 $php_code = substr($php_code, 0, strrpos($php_code, "?>"));
00851                         }
00852                         else
00853                         {
00854                                 $php_code = $php_code . "\n<?php\n";
00855                         }
00856                         return $php_code;
00857                 }

00875                 public function flush_headers()
00876                 {
00877                         if (count($this->headers) > 0)
00878                         {
00879                                 echo "\t\t" . implode("\r\n\t\t", $this->headers) . "\r\n";
00880                         }

00887                 {

00889                         exit();
00890                 }

00931                 protected function compress()
00932                 {
00933                         if (isset($_SERVER['HTTP_ACCEPT_ENCODING']) &&
00934                                 preg_match("/(x-gzip|gzip)/", $_SERVER['HTTP_ACCEPT_ENCODING'], $matches))
00935                         {
00936                                 $this->response->body = gzencode($this->response->body, 9);
00937                                 $this->response->add_header('Content-Encoding', $matches[1]);
00938                         }
00939                 }
00940         }
